item.description: In the previous part of this series, I configured a template VM with cloud-init configs for zero intervention VM automation after provision. In this part, I’ll setup a basic HashiCorp Terraform project for infrastructure as code (IaC) to provision the guest VMs and containers from Proxmox. This will be a great foundation for the homelab, as Terraform can be expanded to cloud automation as well, such as managing Cloudflare DNS records.
